review: Keflex (cephalexin):I have allergies to a lot of antibiotics and the ones I can take I have horrible side effects. Keflex is the only one I'm not allergic to and NO bad side effects. It WORKS. I had sinus infection with ear infection and even though it isn't typically used for sinus infections, always clears it up. Also had a double ear infection. All better. Recommended to those sensitive to meds.
This is the other thing that will get rid of my ear infections. It's cheaper than other medications that don't work.
Keflex (cephalexin):I'm allergic to lots of medicines but this works.
